column1: Cumulative Parent PLUS Loans by Race/ethnicity (with multiple).
The names of the variables used in this table are: PLUSCUM and RACE. The variable names are unique identifiers. To locate these variables, enter the variable name in the search box.
The weight variable used to calculate the data is WTA000
NOTE: Detail may not sum to totals because of rounding.
Source: U.S. Department of Education, National Center for Education Statistics, Baccalaureate and Beyond: 2016/2017 (B&B).
